edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class LongVbl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.LongVbl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LongVbl.And, LongVbl.Max, LongVbl.Min, LongVbl.Or, LongVbl.Sum, LongVbl.Xor

    public class LongVbl
extends Tuple
implements Vbl
    Class LongVbl provides a long integer reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement. A LongVbl is also a Tuple.

    Class LongVbl supports the parallel reduction pattern. Each thread creates a thread-local copy of the shared variable by calling the threadLocal() method of class Loop or the threadLocal() method of class Section. Each thread performs operations on its own copy, without needing to synchronize with the other threads. At the end of the parallel statement, the thread-local copies are automatically reduced together, and the result is stored in the original shared variable. The reduction is performed by the shared variable's reduce() method.

    The following subclasses provide various predefined reduction operations. You can also define your own subclasses with customized reduction operations.

    • Sum -- Class LongVbl.Sum
    • Minimum -- Class LongVbl.Min
    • Maximum -- Class LongVbl.Max
    • Bitwise Boolean and -- Class LongVbl.And
    • Bitwise Boolean or -- Class LongVbl.Or
    • Bitwise Boolean exclusive-or -- Class LongVbl.Xor

      static class  LongVbl.And
      Class LongVbl.And provides a long integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean and as the reduction operation.

      Class LongVbl.Max provides a long integer reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  LongVbl.Min
      Class LongVbl.Min provides a long integer reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  LongVbl.Or
      Class LongVbl.Or provides a long integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  LongVbl.Sum
      Class LongVbl.Sum provides a long integer reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.
      static class  LongVbl.Xor
      Class LongVbl.Xor provides a long integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.

    • Method Detail

      • longValue

        public long longValue()
        Returns the long integer value of this shared variable.

        The base class longValue() method returns the item field. A subclass may override the longValue() method to return something else.

        Returns:
        Long integer value.

      • set

        public void set(Vbl vbl)
        Set this shared variable to the given shared variable. This variable must be set to a deep copy of the given variable.
        Specified by:
        set in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable. The two variables are combined together, and the result is stored in this shared variable. The reduce() method does not need to be multiple thread safe (thread synchronization is handled by the caller).

        The LongVbl base class's reduce() method leaves this shared variable unchanged.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.
